content.text: BatteryBrain values your privacy. This policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

subsections.title: Types of Data
list: Personal Information: Name, email address, phone number, etc.
Usage Data: Information on how you use our website and products.

subsections.title: How Data Is Collected
list: Information you provide directly (e.g., when creating an account).
Automatically collected information (e.g., through cookies and analytics tools).

subsections.title: Purpose
list: To provide and maintain our services.
To communicate with you, including sending product updates and promotional materials.
To improve our website and services.

subsections.title: Legal Basis
subsections.text: We process your personal data based on your consent, contract performance, or legitimate interests.

subsections.title: Measures
list: Access controls to limit who can view or modify your data.

subsections.title: Third-Party Sharing
subsections.text: We do not share your personal data with third parties except as necessary to provide our services or comply with legal obligations.

subsections.title: Access
subsections.text: You have the right to request access to the personal data we hold about you.

subsections.title: Correction
subsections.text: You can request corrections to any inaccurate or incomplete data.

subsections.title: Deletion
subsections.text: You have the right to request the deletion of your personal data.

content.text: For any questions or requests regarding your privacy, please contact privacy@batterybrain.com.
